participant_1.background:
I'm curious about my family's history and where we came from.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.
I do not have my own home yet.
my wife is a breast cancer survivor.
i work as a tutor for english literature.

participant_2.background:
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
I remember always being told to eat my eggs and bacon, even when I didn't like them.
I love my dog so much.
i recently broke my leg.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi! I am doing good, how about you?
I'm glad to hear you are doing well too! I'm curious about my family's history and where we came from. Do you have any interesting family history stories?
I do! I have a lot of family history that I'm really interested in. My dad is from Italy and my mom is from Germany, so I have a lot of interesting stories from both sides of my family.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to go to Italy. Do you have any plans to visit your family's homeland?
Yes, I actually went to Italy last year to visit my dad's side of the family. It was an amazing experience!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm really glad I went.
I'm curious about your job as a barista. Do you enjoy it?
I do! I love working with coffee and creating delicious drinks for my customers. It's a lot of fun and I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
That sounds like a great job! I'm glad you enjoy it.
